name: Shalimar
description: Shalimar is a luxurious oriental fragrance by Guerlain, featuring notes of bergamot, iris, jasmine, rose, and vanilla. It has been a timeless classic since its release in 1925.
notes: Bergamot, Lemon, Iris, Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood

name: Poison
description: Poison by Christian Dior is a bold and mysterious floral fragrance, blending notes of coriander, tuberose, and opopanax. Since its launch in 1985, it has become synonymous with seduction and allure.
notes: Coriander, Plum, Anise, Tuberose, Rose, Jasmine, Opopanax, Cedar, Amber

name: La Vie Est Belle
description: La Vie Est Belle by Lancôme is a sweet and elegant gourmand fragrance featuring iris, patchouli, and vanilla, making life more beautiful with every spray.
notes: Black Currant, Pear, Iris, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Praline, Vanilla, Patchouli, Tonka Bean

name: Acqua di Gio
description: Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani is a fresh, aquatic fragrance with citrus and marine notes, perfect for a clean and masculine scent.
notes: Lime, Lemon, Bergamot, Jasmine, Sea Notes, Cedar, Oakmoss, Musk

name: Mystic Essence
description: Mystic Essence is a captivating fragrance that blends spicy, woody, and floral notes for a mesmerizing, unforgettable scent.

name: Eternal Glow
description: Eternal Glow is a floral scent with hints of jasmine, amber, and patchouli that create a warm and captivating fragrance.

name: Midnight Breeze
description: Midnight Breeze offers an enchanting fragrance with rich floral notes of rose, violet, and a touch of sandalwood for a luxurious scent.
